sentences.cn: .。。“加热器起作用了。”——“什么加热器？”

sentences.en: A high - temperature cut - out isolates power supply to the heater.
sentences.cn: 高温断流器切断给通往热器的电源.

sentences.en: Accessories for the car include a heater and a stereo radio.
sentences.cn: 汽车附件包括暖气装置和立体声收音机.

sentences.en: Always buy a heater with thermostat control to save on running costs.
sentences.cn: 始终购买可调温度的取暖器以节省使用成本。

sentences.en: An electric heater consumes too much electricity.
Dairy barn water heater equipped with Non - CFC foam insulation.
sentences.cn: 挤奶厂热水器配置 无氟 泡沫保温材料.

sentences.en: Did you turn the heater off?
If you are hot you can turn the heater down.
sentences.cn: 如果你觉得热,你可以把暖气拧小.

sentences.en: John Doe died in his bath, asphyxiated by the fumes from a gas water-heater.
sentences.cn: 一名男子死于浴室中，死因是吸入燃气热水器中排出的气体导致窒息。

sentences.en: Run the heater at full blast.
Some appliances, for example a water heater, are connected to the full 240 V.
sentences.cn: 有些用电设备(如煮水器)联接在240伏上.

sentences.en: The coal fire in the hot - air heater quickly warmed the house.
sentences.cn: 暖气炉里的煤火很快地使室内温暖起来.

sentences.en: The company camp: Household gas water heater, electricity water heater, gas stove.
sentences.cn: 公司主营: 家用燃气热水器 、 电热水器 、 燃气采暖炉.

sentences.en: The gas can be cooled by a heat exchanger after the air heater.
sentences.cn: 烟气可以用空气加热器后的热交换器来冷却.

sentences.en: There's an electric heater in the bedroom.

words.tran_cn: 加热；使兴奋（heat的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: [化]空气加热器；热风机；热风器
风扇式空气加热器；暖风机
气体加热器，燃气热水器
旁热式电子管；暖气钢管
热水加热器；热水采暖装置
n. 电热煮沸器；浸没式加热器
即热式热水炉；快热式热水器；瞬时水加热器

trans.tran_cn: 加热器，炉子，加热的人，<美俚>手枪，<美俚>雪茄烟
trans.tran_en: a machine for making air or water hotter
